description:
Elfman and Evergreen still have trouble with their teamwork, but they somehow manage to work together to get the upper hand on Rustyrose. But just when they think they have him cornered, he keeps putting out some other crazy magic! How can they fight against someone who has the ability to turn anything he says into reality?! Meanwhile, Loke realizes the true nature of Caprico, and challenges him to a one-on-one battle!
Source: crunchyroll
